sources.autograph: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.610. 'Mese di Marzo 1796. Quartettino per due violini, viola, e violoncello obbl.° di Luigi Boccherini, compositor di camera di S.M. il Re di Prussia'.
sources.ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.611. Copy made in Berlin for Frederick William II.
sources.first_edition: 1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 40 no. 3 (for title and comment, see No. 240)
sources.modern_edition: (1960?), Hamburg, Marbot: Op. 40 no. 3 (separate parts; revised by W. Höckner). 1963, Wilhelmshaven, Heinrichshofen's, in the series Pegasus Kammermusik Ausgaben: Op. 40 no. 3 (separate parts; revised by H. Mlynarczyk).

entries.notes: The above theme is also used by Boccherini in the piano quintet in D Major Op. 56 no. 5 of 1797 (see No. 411).

sources.first_edition: 1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 40 no. 2 (for title and comment, see No. 240)

partial_notes: Page shows continuation of first edition information from previous entry.
